name: Race America
description: Alex DeMeo's Race America (also known in Europe as Corvette ZR-1 Challenge) is a racing video game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The art style is in a Western art style; a clear sign of its non-Japanese origin. The game was never released in Japan. The European version received the Chevrolet license to use its Corvette vehicles while the North American version had to be redesigned into vehicles that strongly resembled Dodge Vipers.
